p: In general, the leaves recorded the best yield for Passiflora and Solanum, averaging 18.51 ± 0.22% and 18.79 ± 0.21%, respectively, followed by roots (18.33 ± 0.21%), flowers (16.93 ± 0.22%) and stems (16.75 ± 0.20%) for Passiflora. The flowers, roots and stems had average yields of 17.76 ± 0.18%, 17.04 ± 0.21% and 16.23 ± 0.19%, respectively, for Solanum.
